sections.title: Why Use Loops?
sections.content: Loops allow programs to repeat code efficiently. Instead of writing the same code multiple times, loops execute a block of code repeatedly based on a condition.

sections.content: Using while (true) creates an infinite loop that runs forever unless explicitly stopped with a break statement. This is useful for user input scenarios.
